cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gashou

sentence.kanji: 私たちは校歌を合唱したの。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha kouka wo gashou shita no
sentence.english: We sang the school song in chorus.

cards.english: become insane, get out of order
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuruu

sentence.kanji: この時計はすぐ狂うの。
sentence.romaji: kono tokei ha sugu kuruu no
sentence.english: This clock often gets out of whack.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tamanegi

sentence.kanji: 私は玉ねぎが嫌いです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha tamanegi ga kirai desu 。
sentence.english: I hate onions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tama

sentence.kanji: 彼の顔に玉のような汗が流れていたの。
sentence.romaji: kare no kao ni tama no you na ase ga nagarete ita no
sentence.english: Beads of sweat rolled down his face.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dou

sentence.kanji: 10円玉は銅でできています。
sentence.romaji: 10 endama ha dou de dekite imasu
sentence.english: The ten yen coin is made of copper.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tou

sentence.kanji: あの塔の高さはどれくらいですか。
sentence.romaji: ano tou no takasa ha dore kurai desu ka
sentence.english: How tall is that tower?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinju

sentence.kanji: 母に真珠のネックレスをもらいました。
sentence.romaji: haha ni shinju no nekuresu wo moraimashita
sentence.english: I was given a pearl necklace by my mother.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mae

sentence.kanji: その店の前で会いましょう。
sentence.romaji: sono mise no mae de aimashou
sentence.english: Let's meet in front of the shop.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's natsu

sentence.kanji: 私は夏が大好き。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha natsu ga daisuki
sentence.english: I just love summer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's namae

sentence.kanji: あなたの名前を教えてください。
sentence.romaji: anata no namae wo oshiete kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell me your name.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's michi

sentence.kanji: この道を真っ直ぐ行くと駅です。
sentence.romaji: kono michi wo masugu iku to eki desu
sentence.english: Go straight along this road to get to the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuruma

sentence.kanji: 弟が車を買った。
sentence.romaji: otouto ga kuruma wo kata
sentence.english: My younger brother bought a car.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hen

sentence.kanji: 彼はこの辺に住んでいます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha konohen ni sunde imasu
sentence.english: He lives around here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ochiru

sentence.kanji: 猿も木から落ちる。
sentence.romaji: saru mo ki kara ochiru
sentence.english: Monkeys also fall from trees.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuruma

sentence.kanji: この道は車が多い。
sentence.romaji: kono michi ha kuruma ga ooi
sentence.english: There are many cars on this road.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suidou

sentence.kanji: 東京は水道の水が不味い。
sentence.romaji: toukyou ha suidou no mizu ga mazui
sentence.english: Tap water in Tokyo doesn't taste good.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shadou

sentence.kanji: 車道の工事が始まりました。
sentence.romaji: shadou no kouji ga hajimarimashita
sentence.english: The construction of the roadway started.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's goukaku

sentence.kanji: 娘が入学試験に合格しました。
sentence.romaji: musume ga nyuugaku shiken ni goukaku shimashita
sentence.english: My daughter passed the university entrance exam.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyaku

sentence.kanji: その店は若い客が多いです。
sentence.romaji: sono mise ha wakai kyaku ga ooi desu
sentence.english: That shop has a lot of young customers.

cards.english: press, close in on, be imminent
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's semaru

sentence.kanji: 締め切りが迫っています。
sentence.romaji: shimekiri ga semate imasu
sentence.english: The deadline is approaching.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shori

sentence.kanji: 事務的な処理に1週間かかります。
sentence.romaji: jimuteki na shori ni ishuukan kakarimasu
sentence.english: The administrative processing takes one week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nigeru

sentence.kanji: 鳥が窓から逃げたよ。
sentence.romaji: tori ga mado kara nigeta yo
sentence.english: The bird flew out of the window.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otosu

sentence.kanji: 途中で財布を落としました。
sentence.romaji: tochuu de saifu wo otoshimashita
sentence.english: I lost my purse on the way.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omawarisan

sentence.kanji: あのお巡りさんに道を聞きましょう。
sentence.romaji: ano omawarisan ni michi wo kikimashou
sentence.english: Let's ask that policeman how to get there.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakou

sentence.kanji: 格好のいい青年に会ったよ。
sentence.romaji: kakou no ii seinen ni ata yo
sentence.english: I met a good-looking young man.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's manatsu

sentence.kanji: 真夏のビールはおいしい。
sentence.romaji: manatsu no bi-ru ha oishii
sentence.english: Beer is delicious in midsummer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chokuzen

sentence.kanji: 彼は旅行の直前に熱が出たの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ryokou no chokuzen ni netsu ga deta no
sentence.english: He got a fever just before going on holiday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakuji

sentence.kanji: ごみは各自で持ち帰ってください。
sentence.romaji: gomi ha kakuji de mochikaete kudasai
sentence.english: Please take your own garbage home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omae

sentence.kanji: お前の言うことは信じられない。
sentence.romaji: omae no iu koto ha shinjirare nai
sentence.english: I can't believe what you say.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honkakuteki

sentence.kanji: 彼は絵を本格的に勉強しているんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha e wo honkakuteki ni benkyou shite iru n da
sentence.english: He studies painting seriously.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kingaku

sentence.kanji: レシートで買い物の金額を確かめたよ。
sentence.romaji: reshi-to de kaimono no kingaku wo tashikameta yo
sentence.english: I confirmed the cost of the shopping with the receipt.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsure

sentence.kanji: 彼女は私の連れです。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha watashi no tsure desu
sentence.english: She's with me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maemote

sentence.kanji: 休む時は前もって連絡ください。
sentence.romaji: yasumu toki ha maemote renraku kudasai
sentence.english: If you're going to take time off, please give me advance notice.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nigemichi

sentence.kanji: 失敗した時の逃げ道を考えたの。
sentence.romaji: shipai shita toki no nigemichi wo kangaeta no
sentence.english: I considered my escape route if I failed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miotosu

sentence.kanji: 間違いを見落としたの。
sentence.romaji: machigai wo miotoshita no
sentence.english: I failed to notice a mistake.

cards.english: dropping by, going out of the way
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yorimichi

sentence.kanji: 今日は寄り道してから帰ります。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha yorimichi shite kara kaerimasu
sentence.english: I'll take a side trip on the way home today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atari

sentence.kanji: 辺りを見回したの。
sentence.romaji: atari wo mimawashita no
sentence.english: We looked around the area.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mokuzou

sentence.kanji: 隣に木造の家が建ったね。
sentence.romaji: tonari ni mokuzou no ie ga tata ne
sentence.english: A wooden house was built next door.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maemuki

sentence.kanji: 前向きに検討します。
sentence.romaji: maemuki ni kentou shimasu
sentence.english: We'll give positive consideration to the matter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouryaku

sentence.kanji: 地図内の小さい建物は省略してあります。
sentence.romaji: chizunai no chiisai tatemono ha shouryaku shite arimasu
sentence.english: Small buildings have been omitted from the map.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryakusu

sentence.kanji: 国際連合を略して国連といいます。
sentence.romaji: kokusairengou wo ryaku shite kokuren to iimasu
sentence.english: The UN is short for the United Nations.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryaku

sentence.kanji: 「IT」は何の略か知っていますか。
sentence.romaji: aitei- ha nan no ryaku ka shite imasu ka
sentence.english: Do you know what IT stands for?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's michijun

sentence.kanji: 家から学校までの道順を教えてください。
sentence.romaji: ie kara gakou made no michijun wo oshiete kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell me the route from your house to the school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gesha

sentence.kanji: 景色が良かったので途中下車したよ。
sentence.romaji: keshiki ga yokata no de tochuu gesha shita yo
sentence.english: We stopped off on the way because the scenery was lovely.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's michibiku

sentence.kanji: 先生は私たちを導いてくれます。
sentence.romaji: sensei ha watashitachi wo michibiite kuremasu
sentence.english: The teacher guides us.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ochiba

sentence.kanji: 落ち葉の季節になりましたね。
sentence.romaji: ochiba no kisetsu ni narimashita ne
sentence.english: The season of falling leaves has arrived.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nigasu

sentence.kanji: 釣った魚を逃がしました。
sentence.romaji: tsuta sakana wo nigashimashita
sentence.english: I let go of the fish I had caught.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsureru

sentence.kanji: 親が君を一度連れて来いって言うんだ。
sentence.romaji: oya ga kimi wo ichido tsurete koi te iu n da
sentence.english: My parents said I should take you to their place one time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaku

sentence.kanji: 写真を額に入れて飾ったんだ。
sentence.romaji: shashin wo gaku ni irete kazata n da
sentence.english: I put the photo in a frame and hung it up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dougu

sentence.kanji: 道具は全部揃っていますか。
sentence.romaji: dougu ha zenbu sorote imasu ka
sentence.english: Do we have all the tools ready?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meguru

sentence.kanji: 明日から温泉を巡る旅に出ます。
sentence.romaji: ashita kara onsen wo meguru tabi ni demasu
sentence.english: I'm going on a tour of hot springs tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitai

sentence.kanji: 額に汗をかいたよ。
sentence.romaji: hitai ni ase wo kaita yo
sentence.english: His forehead was covered in sweat.
